hu: Can someone of you help me setting up my fluxbox ?
set up in what way?
you've read what i mean ?
i would say check the fluxbox docs/manpage/homepage. - i think they go in .fluxbox/themes
that would be for the root users personal styles.  You running fluxboxc as root? WHY?
man fluxstyle has a lot of info ->  There are many places to store your styles, the most common is in your ~/.fluxbox/styles directory.
so you installed it system wide.. make a .fluxbox/styles dir
yes. each user can have their own styles
its .fluxbox/styles
NOTE the .
try a 'cd .fluxbox'
a . normally 'hides' a direcory/file
ls -a   should show it
you make a styles dir and the files go in that dir.
you may want to install 'mc' and learn to use it.
notice wher ei just said to learn to use mc.. :) thats the easy way.
or go read a few bash tutorials and  learn to use  the 'cp' command. OR use the gnome file manager and open up .fluxbox (just type in the address)
mc is like the #1 thing i always install on a disrto :)
i dont use msn.. :)
check the styles menu now. You may need to restart fluxbox
